text: The Kashyap Koli is a clan (Gotra, Kutumb) of the the Koli caste mostly found in the Indian states of Haryana, Rajasthan, Punjab,Uttar Pradesh, Himachal Pradesh and Madhya Pradesh and the Indian Union Territories of the Chandigarh and Delhi. == Notable == *Virendra Kashyap, two term Member of Parliament (MP) from Shimla Lok Sabha == References == Category:Koli clans
title: Kashyap Koli
